In England, in the seven days to 25 March, there were 497,415 new confirmed cases (879.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 March, there were 464,973 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% (32,442 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 30 March is 17,742,075 (31,374.1 cases per 100,000 population).
